hero.title: Learn skills that get you hired.
hero.subtitle: EduPro Academy blends practical projects, mentorship, and AI-assisted learning to turn beginners into job-ready talent.

items.name: Frontend
items.text: React, Tailwind, APIs, deployment, interview prep.

items.name: Backend
items.text: Python, Django REST, PostgreSQL, Docker, CI/CD.

items.name: Flutter

items.name: UX/UI Design

blocks.name: Bekten Azhymyrza
blocks.description: Hi! My name is Bekten, I'm an IT specialist. I've been working in development for several years and love solving problems with technology. My main focus is web development: I create websites, applications, and various digital services. I started simple — with layouts and small projects for acquaintances, and now I work on more complex systems where architecture, security, and user experience are important. I constantly learn new things: studying modern frameworks, automation, and the latest IT trends.

blocks.name: Bekten Azhymyrza
blocks.description: Hi! My name is Bekten, I'm an IT specialist. I've been working in development for several years and love solving problems with technology. My main focus is web development: I create websites, applications, and various digital services. I started simple — with layouts and small projects for acquaintances, and now I work on more complex systems where architecture, security, and user experience are important. I constantly learn new things: studying modern frameworks, automation, and the latest IT trends.

blocks.text: Projects felt like real work. Mock interviews played a decisive role.
Mentors reviewed every PR. Learned faster than at university.
Got a job offer from an international company after the course. Best investment in myself!
Portfolio with real projects helped me pass the interview on the first try.

about.text: Boost your career, income, and life to a new level. EduPro has helped over 1,200 students get their first job in tech. Become the next one and change your life today!
